This is an Atom formatted XML site feed. It is intended to be viewed in a Newsreader. Alternatively you can view the HTML archives at https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk/cgi-bin/webadmin?A0=UKDATASERVICE.
LISTSERV Web Interface 2.4.1 2015-03-11T16:05:23Z Jack, Sharon 2015-03-11T16:05:14+00:00 2015-03-11T16:05:14+00:00 Announcement: Curating and Managing Research Data for Re-Use workshop https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=UKDATASERVICE;baea378f.1503 The ICPSR Summer Program is offering a five-day workshop on Curating and Managing Research Data for Re-Use<http://www.icpsr.umich.edu/icpsrweb/sumprog/courses/0149>, July 27-31, 2015. This workshop is for individuals interested or actively engaged in the curation and management of research data for sharing and reuse, particularly data librarians, data archivists, and data producers and stewards with responsibilities for data management. [...] Margherita Ceraolo 2015-03-09T09:46:10+00:00 2015-03-09T09:46:10+00:00 New data collections and new editions from the UK Data Service https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=UKDATASERVICE;564fc7e7.1503 The following new datasets have been released:<br><br>SN 7663 Young Lives: School Survey, Vietnam, 2011-2012<http://discover.ukdataservice.ac.uk/catalogue/?sn=7663><br><br>SN 7666 Centre for Population Change General Household Survey Database, 1979-2009: Special Licence Access<http://discover.ukdataservice.ac.uk/catalogue/?sn=7666><br><br>SN 7669 National Child Development Study: Sweep 9, 2013<http://discover.ukdataservice.ac.uk/catalogue/?sn=7669><br><br>SN 7662 Smoking, Drinking and Drug Use among Young People, 2013<http://discover.ukdataservice.ac.uk/catalogue/?sn=7662><br><br>SN 7672 OECD Telecommunications and Internet Statistics, 1980-2014<http://discover.ukdataservice.ac.uk/catalogue/?sn=7672> [...] Pasotti, Annette L 2015-03-04T14:31:36+00:00 2015-03-04T14:31:36+00:00 OECD Telecommunications and Internet Statistics and OECD Monthly Statistics of International Trade - launched on UKDS.stat https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=UKDATASERVICE;c8e13d9.1503 We are delighted to announce that UK FE/HE users can now access two new OECD datasets at the UK Data Service via UKDS.Stat.<br><br>The Telecommunications and Internet Statistics is made up of the Telecommunications Database and Broadband database. The Telecommunications Database provides both telecommunication and economic time-series data covering thirty OECD member countries from 1980 onwards. The broadband database on information and communication technology (ICT) contains quarterly indicators from 2009 on wireless and fixed broadband usage, access and diffusion to OECD households, individuals and businesses. [...] Pasotti, Annette L 2015-03-03T09:26:33+00:00 2015-03-03T09:26:33+00:00 The World at your fingertips \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd Human Rights Atlas dataset available from the UK Data Service https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=UKDATASERVICE;65e93f80.1503 We are pleased to announce the Human Rights Atlas, 1981-2012 dataset, is now available for download from the UK Data Service. Created for the Economic and Social Research Council (ESRC) funded Human Rights Atlas Project, this dataset collates data from over 200 indicators across 190 countries and territories.<br><br>The data provide an insight into the lives and rights of human beings over a 30-year period, using published data from the World Bank, the United Nations, academics, non-governmental organisations and other bodies. The data are available to any user for any purpose under the Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International Licence (CC [...] Margherita Ceraolo 2015-03-02T09:55:35+00:00 2015-03-02T09:55:35+00:00 New data collections and new editions from the UK Data Service https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=UKDATASERVICE;50834eb2.1503 The following new datasets have been released:<br><br>SN 7665 Quarterly Labour Force Survey, October - December, 2014: Special Licence Access<http://discover.ukdataservice.ac.uk/catalogue/?sn=7665><br><br>SN 7664 Quarterly Labour Force Survey, October - December, 2014<http://discover.ukdataservice.ac.uk/catalogue/?sn=7664><br><br>SN 7636 $B!> (B Human Rights Atlas Dataset, 1981-2012<http://discover.ukdataservice.ac.uk/catalogue/?sn=7636> Jack, Sharon 2015-02-24T09:19:48+00:00 2015-02-24T09:19:48+00:00 Data users invited to define outputs for new survey on youth - feedback required by 6 March https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=UKDATASERVICE;b9393681.1502 Data users invited to define outputs for new survey on youth - feedback required by close of Friday 6th March<br><br>What About Youth? is a new Department of Health study which aims to make improvements to the health of young people across England.<br><br>After a successful trial, the survey was launched in September 2014, when around 300,000 pupils from across England were invited to respond to the survey's 72 questions on topic such as alcohol, smoking, exercise and bullying. This offers new user-friendly interfaces to its two thesauri - HASSET and ELSST, as well as an improved maintenance platform for administrators.<br><br>About HASSET and ELSST<br><br>There are clear advantages of searching using thesaurus terms rather than free text for our UK Data Service users. Once such advantage is enabling concept-based rather than lexical-based searching. This in turn reduces time and effort (as a search for a term or any of its synonyms produces the [...] Margherita Ceraolo 2015-02-09T10:23:50+00:00 2015-02-09T10:23:50+00:00 New data collections and new editions from the UK Data Service https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=UKDATASERVICE;35f2c602.1502 The following new datasets have been released:<br><br>SN 7645 Skills and Employment Survey, 2012: Special Licence Access<http://discover.ukdataservice.ac.uk/catalogue/?sn=7645><br><br>SN 7236 Northern Ireland Survey of Activity Limitations and Disability, 2006-2007<http://discover.ukdataservice.ac.uk/catalogue/?sn=7236><br><br>SN 7633 - Welsh Health Survey, 2013: Special Licence Access<http://discover.ukdataservice.ac.uk/catalogue/?sn=7633><br><br>SN 7652 Labour Force Survey Five-Quarter Longitudinal Dataset, July 2012 - September 2013<http://discover.ukdataservice.ac.uk/catalogue/?sn=7652><br><br>SN 7653 Labour Force Survey Five-Quarter Longitudinal Dataset, October 2012 - December 2013<http://discover.ukdataservice.ac.uk/catalogue/?sn=7653> [...] Gillian Meadows 2015-02-09T08:11:47+00:00 2015-02-09T08:11:47+00:00 Workshop: Exploring Longterm Trends in Social Attitudes and Crime https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=UKDATASERVICE;2787dc2c.1502 Exploring Longterm Trends in Social Attitudes and Crime<br><br>Wednesday 20 May 2015, 10am \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd 4pm<br>Computer Lab 2.88, Humanities Bridgeford Street, University of Manchester<br><br>Exploring why change takes place and the implications of both changes and stability is of growing importance for social scientists. Yet the limited availability of datasets which enable these sorts of analyses hampers efforts. [...] Pasotti, Annette L 2015-02-06T13:33:48+00:00 2015-02-06T13:33:48+00:00 UK Data Service launches new Impact Blog https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=UKDATASERVICE;839504d6.1502 UK Data Service launches new Impact Blog<br>We're delighted to announce the launch of the UK Data Service blog: The Data Impact Blog, which is a hub for academics, communities, policy-makers, government and anyone interested in maximising the impact of social, population and economic data in research and policy.<br>The Data Impact Blog<http://blog.ukdataservice.ac.uk/> aims to encourage debate and act as a forum to share best practice, keeping the data impact community up to date with news, events and the latest data-driven impactful research and policy making.<br>The blog also demonstrates the impact of the UK Data Service in widening access [...] Jack, Sharon 2015-02-05T16:43:57+00:00 2015-02-05T16:43:57+00:00 OECD Employment and Labour Market stats launched on UKDS.Stat https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=UKDATASERVICE;fe05d7fc.1502 OECD Employment and Labour Market stats launched on UKDS.Stat<br><br>We are delighted to announce that UK FE/HE users can now access the OECD Employment and Labour Market Statistics via UKDS.Stat.<br><br>The OECD Employment and Labour Market Statistics offers the most comprehensive source of comparable statistics on employment and the labour market across OECD countries. Annual data from 1960 (and in some cases 1950), it includes the following databases: Population and vital statistics, labour force, Population projections, Employment by activities and status, Earnings, Hours Worked, Discouraged workers, Economic short time, Full-time part-time, involuntary part-time workers, labour force statistics by sex and [...] Margherita Ceraolo 2015-02-02T09:48:40+00:00 2015-02-02T09:48:40+00:00 New data collections and new editions from the UK Data Service https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=UKDATASERVICE;fb1b6dc2.1502 The following new datasets have been released:<br><br>SN 7651 Annual Population Survey, July 2013 - June 2014: Special Licence Access<http://discover.ukdataservice.ac.uk/catalogue/?sn=7651><br><br>SN 7650 Annual Population Survey, July 2013 - June 2014<http://discover.ukdataservice.ac.uk/catalogue/?sn=7650><br><br>SN 7568 Border Discourse. Changing Nations, changing Identities, changing Stories in Polish and German Border Communities, 1998-2001<http://discover.ukdataservice.ac.uk/catalogue/?sn=7568><br><br>SN 7637 Understanding Society: Innovation Panel, Waves 1-6, 2008-2013: Special Licence Access, Census 2001 Middle Layer Super Output Areas<http://discover.ukdataservice.ac.uk/catalogue/?sn=7637> [...] Gillian Meadows 2015-01-30T12:25:51+00:00 2015-01-30T12:25:51+00:00 Job Vacancies: Big Data user support and training posts at CMIST https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=UKDATASERVICE;31605fe4.1501 Research Associate (UK Data Service: Big Data)<br>Closing date: 28/02/2015<br><br>Applications are sought for a full-time or part-time Research Associate (Grade 6) to join the UK Data Service User Support and Training team with a particular focus on Big Data. The post would be based in CMIST, University of Manchester, and will involve close liaison with researchers in partner organisations and others working in the Big Data field (including the University of Essex, Big Data Centres and the Administrative Data Service). You will work with the project lead to develop and deliver a programme of training events and online training [...] Gillian Meadows 2015-01-26T14:13:27+00:00 2015-01-26T14:13:27+00:00 CALL FOR PAPERS: Census Applications: Using the UK\ufffd\ufffd\ufffds population census data https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=UKDATASERVICE;e3b5bfa7.1501 [cid:image001.gif@01D0366F.9BE8A810]<br>UK Data Service, Census Support<br>CALL FOR PAPERS<br>Census Applications: Using the UK’s population census data<br>University of Manchester<br>16 \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd 17 July 2015<br>Now that nearly all census outputs are out and being used the UK Data Service are hosting a two day conference to celebrate the UK censuses.<br>We are seeking offers of papers on both analysis and methods.<br>Census methods include policy issues, statistical principles and technological innovation relating to census design, output and dissemination as well as statistical approaches to analysing the final products. We are keen to hear from data producers, distributors and methodologists.<br> [...] Margherita Ceraolo 2015-01-26T11:09:02+00:00 2015-01-26T11:09:02+00:00 New data collections and new editions from 2011-2012<http://discover.ukdataservice.ac.uk/catalogue/?sn=7617><br><br>SN 7618 Continuing Vocational Training Survey, 2010<http://discover.ukdataservice.ac.uk/catalogue/?sn=7618> [...] Jack, Sharon 2015-01-16T16:56:09+00:00 2015-01-16T16:56:09+00:00 Underpinning the Development Data Revolution: Collaboration in Data Archiving - A joint ICSSR/UK Data Service/ESRC workshop https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=UKDATASERVICE;c527d791.1501 On 7-8 January 2015, the UK Data Service hosted a two-day knowledge-exchange event with the Indian Council for Social Science (ICSSR) and the ESRC.<br><br>This event brought together key consultants involved in the planning of an Indian data service with UK Data Service experts. Participants shared their experiences and outlined how to establish and run a successful data service. [...] Gillian Meadows 2015-01-15T09:57:41+00:00 2015-01-15T09:57:41+00:00 Webinar: 2011 Census \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd aggregate data https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=UKDATASERVICE;55d089a7.1501 Interested in what the 2011 census can tell you about the population within countries or smaller areas? Join us for an introduction to using standard census outputs from the 2011 Census.<br><br>Webinar: 2011 Census \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd aggregate data<br>27 January 2015<br>Online at 2pm<br>The most widely used form of outputs from UK Censuses are based on counts. These counts tell us how many people (or households) have particular characteristics within a given area. These data are widely used to understand the characteristics of areas, including small areas. Because they refer to counts which have already been aggregated they are known [...] Gillian Meadows 2015-01-14T09:27:07+00:00 2015-01-14T09:27:07+00:00 Free anonymisation workshops and anonymisation clinics https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=UKDATASERVICE;daf5bdda.1501 Apologies for cross posting<br><br>UK Anonymisation Network<br><br>Anonymisation workshops Jan-March 2015<br><br>These workshops aim to give you confidence when sharing or publishing data derived from personal data. Previous experience with analysing datasets is useful but not required. We will cover the UKAN Anonymisation Decision-Making Framework with basic exercises on aggregating, censoring and considerations about further trade-offs between risk and utility. Advanced legal and technical aspects are out of scope. Jack, Sharon 2015-01-08T18:18:00+00:00 2015-01-08T18:18:00+00:00 UK Data Service open data: IMF datasets now available https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=UKDATASERVICE;8904fa1f.1501 We are delighted to announce that the International Monetary Fund (IMF) datasets are now available to users without the need for registration or authentication.<br><br>As of January 2015, the IMF introduced a new policy whereby access to its online statistics databases became free to all users. As a result, the following IMF datasets hosted by the UK Data Service are available to all: [...] Jack, Sharon 2015-01-08T16:05:09+00:00 2015-01-08T16:05:09+00:00 Book now: UK Data Service: an introduction to data on education webinar https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=UKDATASERVICE;764838a7.1501 Booking is now open for the following free webinar.<br><br>Webinar: UK Data Service: an introduction to data on education<br><br>Join us for a webinar on Jan 27, 2015 at 11:00 PM GMT.<br><br>Register now!<br>https://attendee.gotowebinar.com/register/7514691748579046914<br><br>The UK Data Service is holding an hour-long webinar on the topic of education.<br><br>This is a collaborative webinar involving Beate Lichtwardt from the UK Data Service at the University of Essex and Professor Emla Fitzsimons from the Institute of Education, Centre for Longitudinal Studies, at the University College London. [...] Jack, Sharon 2015-01-08T14:29:55+00:00 2015-01-08T14:29:55+00:00 Vacancy for Support Manager at the UK Data Archive https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=UKDATASERVICE;84cee466.1501 The UK Data Service is seeking to appoint a highly-motivated Support Manager. This is an exciting chance to contribute to the highly-respected and well-used UK Data Service.<br><br>The Service is a comprehensive resource funded by the ESRC to support researchers, teachers and policy makers who depend on high-quality social and economic data. It provides a single point of access to a wide range of secondary data including large-scale government surveys, longitudinal studies, international macrodata, business microdata, qualitative studies and census data from 1971 to 2011. [...] Gillian Meadows 2015-01-07T09:58:41+00:00 2015-01-07T09:58:41+00:00 Booking now open - UK Data Service Census Support workshops: aggregate data and flow data https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=UKDATASERVICE;9c731baf.1501 Booking is now open for the following workshops:<br><br>Workshop: 2011 Census - flow data<br><br>16 February 2015, 2 - 5pm<br>Bedford Way G11, University College London<br><br>The flow data from UK censuses are used to track movements between two geographies; home and work, origin and destination, or first and second residence. Data from the 2011 Census are now becoming available in open and safeguarded format and are expected to be of much higher quality than 2001 data. [...]
